mapper.select: SELECT odi.id, odi.num, odi.price, gs.name, odi.orderStatus, odi.orderCode, gs.detail, gs.img, odi.cretateTime, CONCAT(ai.province,' ',ai.city,' ',ai.area,' ',ai.detailsAddress) as address, ai.receivePhone, su.user_name FROM order_info odi LEFT JOIN goods gs ON odi.goods_id = gs.id LEFT JOIN address_info ai ON odi.address_info_id = ai.id Left JOIN system_user su ON ai.userId = su.id where 1=1 AND odi.orderStatus = #{isAll}

SELECT odi.id, odi.num, odi.price, gs.name, odi.orderStatus, odi.orderCode, gs.detail, gs.img, odi.cretateTime, CONCAT(ai.province,' ',ai.city,' ',ai.area,' ',ai.detailsAddress) as address, ai.receivePhone, su.user_name FROM order_info odi LEFT JOIN goods gs ON odi.goods_id = gs.id LEFT JOIN address_info ai ON odi.address_info_id = ai.id Left JOIN system_user su ON ai.userId = su.id where 1=1 AND odi.orderStatus != 6

SELECT odi.id, odi.num, odi.price, gs.name, odi.orderStatus, odi.orderCode, gs.detail, gs.img, odi.cretateTime, CONCAT(ai.province,' ',ai.city,' ',ai.area,' ',ai.detailsAddress) as address, ai.receivePhone, su.user_name, gs.id as gsId FROM order_info odi LEFT JOIN goods gs ON odi.goods_id = gs.id LEFT JOIN address_info ai ON odi.address_info_id = ai.id Left JOIN system_user su ON ai.userId = su.id where odi.id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET num = num - #{num} WHERE id = #{gsId}
